title: EuroBasket Results, Are The Hawks Or Cavs Better?
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to discuss some standout performers from EuroBasket, including dazzling displays from Luka & Giannis before talking what players may be earning themselves contracts in the NBA. Plus, how concerning Lonzo’s return timetable is for Chicago, ‘What Is Going On In’ Atlanta after their offseason moves and Patrick Beverley and Russell Westbrook’s friendly intro. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Standouts From EuroBasket, Pat Bev And Russ Have Friendly First Intro
